summary: Three interlocking love stories involving three couples in three cities: Rome, Paris, and New York.
cast: Liam Neeson|Maria Bello|Mila Kunis|Kim Basinger|Michele Melega|Adrien Brody|Gianni Franco|Marius Bizau|Olivia Wilde|Katy Louise Saunders|James Franco|Loan Chabanol|Oliver Crouch|Valentina Gaia|Riccardo Scamarcio|Aldo Bufi Landi|Moran Atias|Daniela Virgilio|Fabrizio Biggio|Vinicio Marchioni|Vincent Riotta|Bob Messini|Ilaria Genatiempo|Francesco Cataldo|Veejay Kaur|Caroline Goodall|David Harewood|Francesco Apolloni|Emanuela Postacchini|Fausto Mezzana|Michael Margotta|Veronica Gentili|Isabella Blake-Thomas|Evangelo Bousis|Patrick Duggan|Gisella Marengo|Rishad Noorani
title: En tercera persona
